Additionally you never know when something might go wrong during set-up, such as a broken pole or even a sudden tear inside your tent.
Once you reach your campsite, one thing, you should do is always to start collecting wood for the fire. You won't feel as if it afterwards, and in case you hold off until dark you will find a harder time finding the sort of wood you should keep a fire going. Do it properly away.
Are you aware that a basic mirror will save your daily life? When you are camping and wind up in a survival situation, a simple handheld mirror could be used to signal for help many miles away.
